dataset.title: New Zealand Public Sector Websites
dataset.description: List of websites owned and administered by the New Zealand Public Sector. The Department of Internal Affairs acknowledges this list has been compiled to the best of their knowledge, but it is not a complete list of all Public Sector websites. This list will be updated as the Department becomes aware of required updates.

publisher.name: Department of Internal Affairs

dataset.title: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment Chief Executive Expenses
dataset.description: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment Chief Executive Expenses for the period of: 1 July - 31 December 2012, 1 January - 30 June 2013, 1 July 2013 to 30 June 2014, 1 July 2014 to 30 June 2015, 1 July 2015 to 30 June 2016, 1 July 2016 to 30 June 2017, 1 July 2017 to 31 December 2017, 1 January - 30 June 2018

publisher.name: Ministry of Business Innovation and Employment

dataset.title: The Companies Office
dataset.description: The Companies Office provides a free service that allows registered users to search the companies register by company names. The data source is updated on a real-time basis. This service is available as a RESTful service or a web service.

dataset.title: Energy Statistics
dataset.description: As part of our ongoing commitment to provide timely and accessible energy information, this section presents energy statistics including supply and demand by fuel types, energy balance tables, pricing information, international comparisons and greenhouse gas emissions. Each page contains a topic summary and data tables in Excel format.

dataset.title: New Zealand Tourism Forecasts
dataset.description: Our tourism forecasts provide expectations on the future tourism demand in New Zealand, and inform and support planning and investment decisions in the tourism industry. The forecasts are based on econometric modelling, current trends and best available forecasts of international factors, and are developed with input from members of the tourism industry.

publisher.name: Ministry of Business Innovation and Employment

dataset.title: Migration Data Explorer
dataset.description: The Migration Data Explorer enables you to easily access migration data to address the overarching research themes and enduring questions that relate to migration in New Zealand.

publisher.name: Ministry of Business Innovation and Employment

dataset.title: IPONZ
dataset.description: IPONZ help New Zealand and international businesses protect their intellectual property rights in New Zealand. They collect data about patent, trade mark, design, and plant variety rights application volumes.

publisher.name: Ministry of Business Innovation and Employment

dataset.title: Insolvency Statistics
dataset.description: The Insolvency and Trustee Service (ITS) is a business unit of the Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment. ITS is also called the Official Assignee�s Office. The Official Assignee is appointed under the State Sector Act 1988 to administer the Insolvency Act 2006, the insolvency provisions of the Companies Act 1993 and the Criminal Proceeds (Recovery) Act 2009. The Official Assignee administers all bankruptcies, No Asset Procedures, Summary Instalment Orders and some liquidations.

publisher.name: Ministry of Business Innovation and Employment

dataset.landingPage: View bankruptcy, liquidation, No Asset Procedure and Summary Instalment Order statistics.

dataset.title: The New Zealand Tourism Dashboard
dataset.description: The New Zealand Tourism Dashboard is a one-stop shop for all information about tourism. It brings together a range of tourism datasets produced by MBIE and Statistics New Zealand into one easy-to-use tool. Information is presented using dynamic graphs and data tables.

dataset.title: Rental bond data by Territorial Authority
dataset.description: The files below include the private bonds, starting from January 1993. 'Private' means private sector landlords. This data comes from MBIE's tenancy bond database, which records all new rental bonds that are lodged with us each month. Note: The Territorial Authorities in these files are pre-2011. This means that "Auckland" refers to the pre-merger Auckland City area. For post-merger Auckland, use the "Auckland" column in the regional tables.

publisher.name: Ministry of Business Innovation and Employment
